# GitHub Repository Description

Use this description for the GitHub About section:

## Short Description
A comprehensive spiritual journaling iOS app with prayer tracking, Bible study, and community features.

## Full Description
Faith Journal is a feature-rich iOS application built with SwiftUI and SwiftData that helps believers document their spiritual journey. Features include journal entries with media attachments, prayer request tracking, daily Bible verses, curated devotionals, mood tracking, live community sessions, and comprehensive analytics. The app supports 9 color themes, biometric security, iCloud sync, and multi-user collaboration through CloudKit.
